name: insomnia-plugin-samlassertion
description: SAML Assertion generator for SuccessFactors API's
author: Éder Souza <edersouza38@gmail.com|

insomnia.name: samlassertion
insomnia.displayName: SAML Assertion generator for SuccessFactors API's
insomnia.description: SAML Assertion generator to obtain OAuth tokens from SuccessFactors, as described in SAP Documentation https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_SUCCESSFACTORS_PLATFORM/d599f15995d348a1b45ba5603e2aba9b/4e27e8f6ae2748ab9f23228dd6a31b06.html?locale=en-US. Based on the npm package "saml" from auth0.
